title: Arrest made in death of 51-year-old Queens woman found in duffel bag near home - CNN
content:
1. Arrest made in death of 51-year-old Queens woman found in duffel bag near home  CNN
  2. Authorities point to surveillance footage in murder of NYC mother  ABC News
  3. Murdered NYC mom Orsolya Gaal: NYPD arrests 44-year-old David Bonola in gruesome Queens slaying  Fox News
  4. Cops hope boots will help ID NYC mom Orsolya Gaal's killer: police source  New York Post
  5. Suspect arrested in murder of Orsolya Gaal, New York woman found dead in duffel bag  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A 44-year-old man was arrested Thursday in the death of 51-year-old Orsolya Gaal, who was found over the weekend inside a duffel bag in Queens, the New York City Police Department said.
